name: NORCO Intelligent Technology Co Ltd
overview:
NORCO has become one of the leading design and manufacturing companies in the industrial PC field. The products of our self-owned brand-NORCO are widely used in computer-based applications. After 20 years of strenuous efforts, NORCO has been praised by IT giants such as Intel and Microsoft. NORCO is a member of Intel Embedded and Commutations Alliance (ECA), cooperative partner of Microsoft Embedded Program. And NORCO has elevated to associate level in Intel Embedded Alliance.

Additionally, NORCO provides tailored OEM & ODM solutions. NORCOâ€™s professional ODM/OEM service provides customers the competitive advantages with the effective reduction of the TSC (Total System Cost) and time-to-market.

“Customer oriented, application oriented and product oriented”——with these three principles, NORCO also provides the custom uncompromised solutions which are tailored to their demanding applications.
